file_content.text: Coronet's still got some fight left in her.
I made sure your engineers got the job done. Tram should be running fine now.
I knew you wouldn't let us down!
The Empire's dead set on strangling this city, but with people like you watching over her, she just might pull through.
The rocket tram is this city's lifeblood. We're all counting on you to keep her running.
Heartbreaking, isn't it? What the Empire's done to this city.
Used to be so... alive. The Jewel of Corellia. Made you wanna shine her up and put her in your pocket.
Now she's... well, just look at her!
We will drive the Empire off Corellia.
This is only temporary.
Hope so. Can't stand to see her suffer like this.
Once we rebuild, this city will be even more beautiful than before.
We can fix it.
Hard to improve on perfection. Place was a gem in her heyday.
War takes a heavy toll on a city.
Battlefields are rough.
She can take it. She has to.
Yeah, this is one ugly town you've got here.
Looks pretty miserable.
Hey, be nice. Sure, she's a little... homely right now, but she's still got heart.
You're really attached to this city, aren't you?
"She"?
Prettiest city in the galaxy. Look it up.
We'll just do the same to one of their cities.
They'll pay for this.
Imperials got nothing that can hold a candle to Coronet.
The Empire's destroyed so much. Buildings tall as the sky and old as dirt, gone. Now they're gunning for the rocket tram.
Hit one of the main lines with explosives. Didn't down her, but she's in a bad way. Could go any time.
The Imperials couldn't blow it up? I'm impressed.
It's still standing?
Coronet's sturdier than she looks. Her pieces don't break easy.
How long before the tram buckles?
Any time?
Sometime between "soon" and "now."
Not like the Empire to leave a job half-done. They'll be back.
The Imperials won't stop.
And we'll be waiting.
That tram's the main supply line for the Republic troops stationed in Axial Park. Empire means to cut them off.
I've got a team standing by to repair the damage, but they're gonna need someone to watch their backs.
The troops need their supplies. I'll protect your men.
We can't let that tram fall.
Appreciate that. Coronet does, too.
What needs to be done?
My team should be in position now. Just waiting for some muscle before they start patching up that tram.
Imperials won't take kindly to us undoing all their hard work. Things could get ugly.
I'm busy. [Refuse quest]
This city needs you!
Don't judge Coronet by what you see now. Used to be the envy of the Republic.
